description: T.618 Prunus - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, crown lift to 3m over garden area and cut back to boundary laterals overhanging neighbouring outbuilding. T.619 Apple - 1.5-2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points. T.620 Apple - 1.5-2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points. T.620a Horse Chestnut - Remove epicormic growth.T.621 Horse Chestnut - Carry out resistograph & monitor. T.624 Sycamore - Reduce height by 3-4m & shape into remaining crown sympathetically with all cuts to suitable growth points, crown lift to 4m from ground level removing epicormic growth & Deadwood.T.624 Sycamore - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.625 Ash - Fell.T.626 Silver Birch - Reduce height by 3m & laterals by 1.5m reshaping sympathetically to suitable growth points & deadwood.
